description: Delete usage that you have created in a Workload estimate. You can only delete usage that you had added and cannot model deletion (or removal) of a existing usage. If you want model removal of an existing usage, see BatchUpdateWorkloadEstimateUsage.

parameters.name: workloadEstimateId
parameters.description: The ID of the Workload estimate for which you want to delete the modeled usage.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: List of usage that you want to delete from the Workload estimate. (string) ---

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: Returns the list of errors reason and the usage item keys that cannot be deleted from the Workload estimate.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The message that describes the error.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with the error.
